main event: A blue-white object, the size of a basketball, was observed hanging in the air before moving off at high speed in Holt, Minnesota.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound during the sighting., It appeared directly overhead and had a brief duration of 2-3 minutes., Observers noted that the whole countryside lit up, making automobile headlights dim., The object disappeared in several small chunks of blue-white light., Preliminary investigations revealed no definite identification for the object, suggesting it might have been a meteor.
witness description: a group of passengers in a private automobile, including an experienced airbase operator and pilot
